title: Week Seven - Eat Mostly Whole Foods

items.text:
Continue with your experiment from the previous week. If it’s been going well then increase the difficulty slightly eg raise the % of whole foods on your plate’.
If you’ve found it difficult then scale it back slightly. Remember the goal is to get regular practice.
If you’d like to change Experiment then you can.

items.title: Experiments
items: Add extra portions of whole foods to your meals
Eat …% whole foods at each meal (choose own percentage)
swap out snacks for fruit/vegetables/hummus alternatives
